resources.string: Please enter your email address below and we will send you instructions on how to change your password!
Enter your validation code here which you received by email
Are you sure you want to \n logout from the app?
You can change your password \n just in easy step!
Do you want to become a Driver?
Please enter the price you want to offer along for this ride.
Would you like to make an offer for this ride?
Would you like to join this ride as a free trip?
Please enter the number of bags and submit to book the ride for estimated cost.
You have successfully created a local trip. Offers for local trips are standardized to $5.00, bypassing the price negotiation process.
Some error occurred, Please try again!
Must be at least 4 characters long
You have pending Friend Invites, please either cancel their invites or wait for their status to be updated

If you select the expedited payment option then you should expect to receive a payment within 2 business days after the trip is completed. Please note an additional processing fee of 5% will be charged to your trip earnings when selecting this payment option.

If you select the standard payment option then you should expect to receive payment within 5 business days after the trip is completed. No additional processing fees will be charged for this payment option.
